name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, launch Haiku Reader”
”Ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
”Open Haiku Reader and tell me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a skill that reads famous haikus: traditional Japanese poems structured in three phrases of 5, 7, and 5 syllables.

You use the skill simply by asking:
"Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
